Aim check! Safety check!\""},{"lineNumber":153783,"originalJapaneseLine":"　準備良ーーーし！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ready---set!\""},{"lineNumber":153784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チューリップ2号マレスケ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tulip No. 2 Malesque!\""},{"lineNumber":153785,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":153786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってェーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heeeyyyyy!\""},{"lineNumber":153787,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界が白光で包まれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The world was enveloped in white light,"},{"lineNumber":153788,"originalJapaneseLine":"爆音が周囲一帯から一瞬だけ音を消失させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the blast sound caused the surrounding area to momentarily lose all noise."},{"lineNumber":153789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、なにしてるの！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, what are you doing?"},{"lineNumber":153790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　休まず撃ち続けて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Keep firing without stopping!\""},{"lineNumber":153791,"originalJapaneseLine":"砲撃の音にかき消され声は届かないが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Their voices were drowned out by the gunfire and could not be heard,"},{"lineNumber":153792,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでも尚、部隊員の女の子は声を張り上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"but still, the squad girls shouted at the top of their lungs."},{"lineNumber":153793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「撃って撃って撃ちまくって！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shoot, shoot, and keep shooting!"},{"lineNumber":153794,"originalJapaneseLine":"　撃てば撃つだけ当たるんだから！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The more you shoot, the more it hits!\""},{"lineNumber":153795,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍戦線左翼――","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army front line left wing—"},{"lineNumber":153796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来たぞ！　皆、退避行動！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're coming! Everyone, fall back!\""},{"lineNumber":153797,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出した魔軍、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, led strategically by Bares to advance,"},{"lineNumber":153798,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィを中心とした部隊を目標に","translatedEnglishLine":"aimed at the unit centered around the demon Silky,"},{"lineNumber":153799,"originalJapaneseLine":"マレスケより砲撃が放たれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"when a bombardment was unleashed from Malesque."},{"lineNumber":153800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだ今の音は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what was that sound just now?"},{"lineNumber":153801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに、な、何か来る、なにかが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"And something's coming, something's coming!\""},{"lineNumber":153802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、うわぁぁああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, waahhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":153803,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の刹那――","translatedEnglishLine":"In the next instant—"},{"lineNumber":153804,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に砲撃が雨の如く降り注ぐ。","translatedEnglishLine":"artillery fire rained down on the spot like rain."},{"lineNumber":153805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぎゃあああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugyahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":153806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、うわ、なんじゃこりゃあああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, waah, what the hell is this!\""},{"lineNumber":153807,"originalJapaneseLine":"爆風で地はえぐれ付近の魔物は吹き飛ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The blast cratered the ground and nearby monsters were blown away."},{"lineNumber":153808,"originalJapaneseLine":"直撃を受けた魔物は四肢が千切れ飛び、","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters hit directly had their limbs torn off,"},{"lineNumber":153809,"originalJapaneseLine":"焼け焦げた肉塊に姿を変えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"transforming into charred lumps of flesh."},{"lineNumber":153810,"originalJapaneseLine":"地面を揺らす轟音と、","translatedEnglishLine":"The deafening roar that shook the earth,"},{"lineNumber":153811,"originalJapaneseLine":"激しい土煙により視界すら覆われ、","translatedEnglishLine":"and the heavy dust clouds obscured even their vision,"},{"lineNumber":153812,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線の魔物兵は途端にパニックに陥った。","translatedEnglishLine":"causing the frontline demon soldiers to immediately fall into panic."},{"lineNumber":153813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げほっ、げほっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cough, cough!"},{"lineNumber":153814,"originalJapaneseLine":"　い、いったいなんなんだよ、今のは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what the heck was that just now!?\""},{"lineNumber":153815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":153816,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ドォォォオオオォォォン！！！！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <BOOOOOM!!!!>"},{"lineNumber":153817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はひっ！？　こ、この音は……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah!? Th-this sound is...!\""},{"lineNumber":153818,"originalJapaneseLine":"姿は見えずとも既に砲撃の脅威を知る魔軍は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the enemy forces could not see, they already knew the threat of the bombardment,"},{"lineNumber":153819,"originalJapaneseLine":"まず音に怯え、まともな行動が封じられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and first were terrified by the sound, unable to act properly."},{"lineNumber":153820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来る！　また来るぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're coming! They're coming again!"},{"lineNumber":153821,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わああああ！　誰か助けてくれえええ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Waaaaa! Somebody help meee!\""},{"lineNumber":153822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――見えた！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—I see it!\""},{"lineNumber":153823,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィが飛び出して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky jumped forward,"},{"lineNumber":153824,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長を身を挺して守った。","translatedEnglishLine":"shielding the monster captain with her body."},{"lineNumber":153825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":153826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……助か、った……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, oh... Am I saved...?\""},{"lineNumber":153827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方！　なにをしてるの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You! What are you doing!?\""},{"lineNumber":153828,"originalJapaneseLine":"甲冑の中から聞こえるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"From inside the armor came a voice,"},{"lineNumber":153829,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外にも若々しい女性の声だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"unexpectedly a youthful woman's voice."},{"lineNumber":153830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この攻撃じゃあ兵が無駄に死ぬだけよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With this attack, soldiers will just die needlessly!"},{"lineNumber":153831,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今すぐ撤退をしなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Retreat immediately!\""},{"lineNumber":153832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！？　て、撤退は駄目だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? N-no, we can't retreat!"},{"lineNumber":153833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなことをしたと知られれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"If it's known that we did that,"},{"lineNumber":153834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我らはヨシフ大将軍に処刑される！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we'll be executed by Generalissimo Yosif!\""},{"lineNumber":153835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha...\""},{"lineNumber":153836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、邪魔だどけ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, get out of the way!"},{"lineNumber":153837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、お前ら！　死にたくなければ突撃だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-you guys! If you don't want to die, charge!"},{"lineNumber":153838,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死にもの狂いで敵の戦線を崩せ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Desperately break the enemy lines!\""},{"lineNumber":153839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここにもいつ砲撃が来るか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The shelling could come here at any moment..."},{"lineNumber":153840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おおおお、俺の為にも急げェェ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ohhh, hurry up for my sake too!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな、準備はいいわね！」
「弾良し！　照準良し！　安全確認良し！
準備良ーーーし！」
「チューリップ2号マレスケ！」
「ってェーーーーー！」
世界が白光で包まれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world was enveloped in white light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆音が周囲一帯から一瞬だけ音を消失させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the blast sound caused the surrounding area to momentarily lose all noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、なにしてるの！
休まず撃ち続けて！」
砲撃の音にかき消され声は届かないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their voices were drowned out by the gunfire and could not be heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも尚、部隊員の女の子は声を張り上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still, the squad girls shouted at the top of their lungs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撃って撃って撃ちまくって！
撃てば撃つだけ当たるんだから！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The more you shoot, the more it hits!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍戦線左翼――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army front line left wing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たぞ！　皆、退避行動！」
バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出した魔軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, led strategically by Bares to advance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィを中心とした部隊を目標に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aimed at the unit centered around the demon Silky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マレスケより砲撃が放たれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when a bombardment was unleashed from Malesque.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ今の音は！
それに、な、何か来る、なにかが！」
「うわ、うわぁぁああああ！」
次の刹那――
その場に砲撃が雨の如く降り注ぐ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: artillery fire rained down on the spot like rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぎゃあああ！」
「うわ、うわ、なんじゃこりゃあああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, waah, what the hell is this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆風で地はえぐれ付近の魔物は吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blast cratered the ground and nearby monsters were blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃を受けた魔物は四肢が千切れ飛び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters hit directly had their limbs torn off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼け焦げた肉塊に姿を変えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: transforming into charred lumps of flesh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面を揺らす轟音と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The deafening roar that shook the earth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激しい土煙により視界すら覆われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the heavy dust clouds obscured even their vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線の魔物兵は途端にパニックに陥った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing the frontline demon soldiers to immediately fall into panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げほっ、げほっ！
い、いったいなんなんだよ、今のは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what the heck was that just now!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドォォォオオオォォォン！！！！＞
「はひっ！？　こ、この音は……！」
姿は見えずとも既に砲撃の脅威を知る魔軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the enemy forces could not see, they already knew the threat of the bombardment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まず音に怯え、まともな行動が封じられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and first were terrified by the sound, unable to act properly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来る！　また来るぞ！
わああああ！　誰か助けてくれえええ！」
シルキィが飛び出して、
魔物隊長を身を挺して守った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shielding the monster captain with her body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おお……助か、った……？」
「貴方！　なにをしてるの！？」
甲冑の中から聞こえるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From inside the armor came a voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも若々しい女性の声だった。
「この攻撃じゃあ兵が無駄に死ぬだけよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this attack, soldiers will just die needlessly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今すぐ撤退をしなさい！」
「なっ！？　て、撤退は駄目だ！
そんなことをしたと知られれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's known that we did that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らはヨシフ大将軍に処刑される！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll be executed by Generalissimo Yosif!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、邪魔だどけ！
お、お前ら！　死にたくなければ突撃だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you guys! If you don't want to die, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死にもの狂いで敵の戦線を崩せ！」
「ここにもいつ砲撃が来るか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The shelling could come here at any moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおおお、俺の為にも急げェェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ohhh, hurry up for my sake too!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな、準備はいいわね！」
「弾良し！　照準良し！　安全確認良し！
準備良ーーーし！」
「チューリップ2号マレスケ！」
「ってェーーーーー！」
世界が白光で包まれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world was enveloped in white light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆音が周囲一帯から一瞬だけ音を消失させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the blast sound caused the surrounding area to momentarily lose all noise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、なにしてるの！
休まず撃ち続けて！」
砲撃の音にかき消され声は届かないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their voices were drowned out by the gunfire and could not be heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも尚、部隊員の女の子は声を張り上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but still, the squad girls shouted at the top of their lungs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撃って撃って撃ちまくって！
撃てば撃つだけ当たるんだから！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The more you shoot, the more it hits!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍戦線左翼――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army front line left wing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たぞ！　皆、退避行動！」
バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出した魔軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, led strategically by Bares to advance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィを中心とした部隊を目標に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aimed at the unit centered around the demon Silky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マレスケより砲撃が放たれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when a bombardment was unleashed from Malesque.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ今の音は！
それに、な、何か来る、なにかが！」
「うわ、うわぁぁああああ！」
次の刹那――
その場に砲撃が雨の如く降り注ぐ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: artillery fire rained down on the spot like rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぎゃあああ！」
「うわ、うわ、なんじゃこりゃあああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, waah, what the hell is this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆風で地はえぐれ付近の魔物は吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blast cratered the ground and nearby monsters were blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃を受けた魔物は四肢が千切れ飛び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters hit directly had their limbs torn off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼け焦げた肉塊に姿を変えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: transforming into charred lumps of flesh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面を揺らす轟音と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The deafening roar that shook the earth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激しい土煙により視界すら覆われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the heavy dust clouds obscured even their vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線の魔物兵は途端にパニックに陥った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing the frontline demon soldiers to immediately fall into panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げほっ、げほっ！
い、いったいなんなんだよ、今のは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what the heck was that just now!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドォォォオオオォォォン！！！！＞
「はひっ！？　こ、この音は……！」
姿は見えずとも既に砲撃の脅威を知る魔軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the enemy forces could not see, they already knew the threat of the bombardment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まず音に怯え、まともな行動が封じられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and first were terrified by the sound, unable to act properly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来る！　また来るぞ！
わああああ！　誰か助けてくれえええ！」
シルキィが飛び出して、
魔物隊長を身を挺して守った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shielding the monster captain with her body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おお……助か、った……？」
「貴方！　なにをしてるの！？」
甲冑の中から聞こえるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From inside the armor came a voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも若々しい女性の声だった。
「この攻撃じゃあ兵が無駄に死ぬだけよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this attack, soldiers will just die needlessly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今すぐ撤退をしなさい！」
「なっ！？　て、撤退は駄目だ！
そんなことをしたと知られれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's known that we did that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らはヨシフ大将軍に処刑される！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we'll be executed by Generalissimo Yosif!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、邪魔だどけ！
お、お前ら！　死にたくなければ突撃だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you guys! If you don't want to die, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死にもの狂いで敵の戦線を崩せ！」
「ここにもいつ砲撃が来るか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The shelling could come here at any moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおおお、俺の為にも急げェェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ohhh, hurry up for my sake too!"
